thread.title: R2-D2 Airplane Ready to Take Flight
thread.title_full: R2-D2 Airplane Ready to Take Flight

author: Bradley Hasemeyer
title: R2-D2 Airplane Ready to Take Flight
text: Previous Next Watch the Star Wars R2-D2 plane from All Nippon Airways come to life! The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares that video and 3 facts about the flight, on The List! 1. The plane will fly to Seattle and San Jose from Asia as well as other international destinations. 2. Passengers will be able to watch all 6 of the previous Star Wars films. 3. The first flight takes off on October 18th. The next Star Wars themed plane will be inspired by BB-8. What other characters would you like to see? Let us know in the comments below.
